game.name: Food Processing Simulator
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Build and manage your own food processing factory. Automate production with machines, work together with skilled employees to keep operations running smoothly, expand your facility, and keep inventory under control as you grow from a small workshop into a large scale production facility.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build and manage your own food processing factory. Automate production with machines, work together with skilled employees to keep operations running smoothly, expand your facility, and keep inventory under control as you grow from a small workshop into a large scale production facility.

reviewHighlights.text: 당일 납품끝나서 할일없으신분 esc 눌러서 하루끝내기 하면됨
나쁘진 않긴한데 컨베이어 벨트 속도좀 빠르게 조절가능 하게 했음 좋겠슴
